Class TuitionManager

java.lang.Object
TuitionManager
public class TuitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class is called when running the program. The methods are the different commands that can be run to change the list of Students.
Author:
Chris Zachariah (cvz2), Anthony Topol (at877)

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    int CRED_MIN_IN_OUT  
    int CRED_MIN_INTERN  
    (package private) StudentList cs213  
    char FALSE  
    int FUND_MIN  
    (package private) java.util.Scanner stdin  
    char TRUE  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TuitionManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addInState()
    This private method will make an instance of an In-State Student and add him/her to the list.
    private void addIntern()
    This private method will make an instance of an International Student and add him/her to the list.
    private void addOutState()
    This private method will make an instance of an Out-State Student and add him/her to the list.
    private void print()
    This private method will print the Students currently on the list.
    private void remove()
    This private method will be used to remove a specific Student from the list.
    void run()
    This method will be used to run the main program.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • TuitionManager

      public TuitionManager()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method will be used to run the main program. The rest of the private methods are accepted commands that will be used to manipulate the list of Students.

    • addInState

      private void addInState()
      This private method will make an instance of an In-State Student and add him/her to the list.

    • addOutState

      private void addOutState()
      This private method will make an instance of an Out-State Student and add him/her to the list.

    • addIntern

      private void addIntern()
      This private method will make an instance of an International Student and add him/her to the list.

    • remove

      private void remove()
      This private method will be used to remove a specific Student from the list. The Student must be present within the list.

    • print

      private void print()
      This private method will print the Students currently on the list.
